item.title: BAC
item.description: score:-25 Chances: Bank of America may be a buy due to its upcoming dividend payout. Expansion of credit card cashback rewards and benefits for customers. Positive growth and gains in trading desks for Bank of America. Enhancements in credit card rewards for electric vehicle owners.
